name: Agglomeration Rotation
description:
AGGLOMERATION ROTATION

This is my submission for Miz Jam 1. I bit off more than I could chew with this cube expansion mechanic, that was supposed to be like 2D Katamari Damacy. I got stuck while working on the bow tile to pick up that shot arrows, when I ran out of time.  I still think it's fun to roll around and pick stuff up and grow the cube though, so I'm submitting so people can see. I will probably pick this project back up after the jam to add much needed fullness to the gaming experience.

WASD to move cube

THE BOW AND ARROWS ARE SUPER GLITCHY,  avoid entirely to prevent breaking the cube expansion mechanic.

https://soundcloud.com/a-welby/agglomeration-rotation-v2

^ song i made for game posted her
